Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
socketpp::AddrHandlerClass which deals with several things, like dns resolving or address format conversion
socketpp::BaseSocketAbstract base class
socketpp::errorSocket-related exception class
ftplib::error_permException thrown when a FTP error code in the range 500-599 is received
ftplib::error_protoException thrown when a unexpected reply from the server is received
ftplib::error_tempException thrown when a FTP error code in the range 400-499 is received
ftplib::FTPThis class tries to imitate the ftplib.FTP python class, with a few differences
socketpp::h_errorAddress-related exception class
socketpp::ICMP_IP_RawSocketICMP raw socket with IP header handling
socketpp::ICMP_RawSocketICMP raw socket without IP header handling
socketpp::IP_RawSocketIP raw socket, without transport-based protocol. ONLY SENDING METHODS WORK
socketpp::RawSocketAbstract base raw socket class. This class and all its derived classes don't require to perform any byte order conversion
socketpp::SockBufPublicly derived from std::streambuf and BaseSocket
socketpp::SocketInherits from BaseSocket, it aims to be a simple C-socket wrapper
socketpp::SocketServerTCP server class which can accept simultaneously multiple connections through multithreading
socketpp::SockStreamInherits from std::iostream, it allows the C++ stream approach with sockets
socketpp::TCP_IP_RawSocketTCP raw socket with IP header handling
socketpp::TCP_RawSocketTCP raw socket without IP header handling
socketpp::timeoutTimeout-related exception class
socketpp::UDP_IP_RawSocketUDP raw socket with IP header handling
socketpp::UDP_RawSocketUDP raw socket without IP header handling
